title: How Lael Wilcox Kept Her Bike Rolling While Riding Around the World
content:
On September 11, Wilcox set the female Guinness World Record for fastest circumnavigation of the globe by bicycle. This is how she kept her Specialized Roubaix running ‘flawlessly’ for 18,125 miles.

Read the full article at How Lael Wilcox Kept Her Bike Rolling While Riding Around the World on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
